channel.title: Tips in R on Anh Hoang Duc
channel.description: Recent content in Tips in R on Anh Hoang Duc

item.title: Install R packages from Github through proxy
item.description: The easiest way to install an R package is from R-Cran. However, as the number of R users is growing up very fast, many developers are contribute to R community through Github. And the standard way to install from Github is to use devtools package with install_github() command. In many organization, especially financial organization like banking industry, sometimes it is very hard to install an R package from CRAN or Github due to security process.
